mapper.update: update `User` set userCode=#{userCode}, userName=#{userName}, userRole=#{userRole}, depId=#{depId}, password=#{password}, phoneNumber=#{phoneNumber} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.userCode,u.depId,u.userRole, u.userName,(SELECT dataName FROM dictionary AS d WHERE id=u.userRole )AS dataName,(SELECT p.depName FROM department AS p WHERE p.id=u.depId)AS depName ,u.password,u.phoneNumber FROM `user` AS u where id=#{userId}
